page.title: 11 Visit to Flatford Mill
page.content: On Monday the 24th June 1985 a group from our school went to{Flatford Field Study Centre for an{education visit week. We stayed in Willy Lotts Cottage. On a typical day in the morning we had to get up at 7 o/clock and then wash ourselves and clean our teeth. Then we had breakfast. After breakfast we made our packed lunches. On the first day we found out about John Constable the artist who lived in{Dedham.}On Tuesday we went to the paddock to look at food chains. We took the things we found away to examine. On Tuesday afernoon we went {birdwatching}and we saw a redshank and a kestrel. On Wednesday we looked at how a woodland works. On Thursday we went mammal trapping and pond dipping. We caught 14 bank voles. On Friday we came home.
